prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with vibrant purple fur and bright red eyes.
I want a creature that resembles an insect with large antennae and a fuzzy body.
Generate an adorable Pokemon that has a round body covered in purple and red patterns.
Make a unique Pokemon that has a small size and a playful personality.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in grassy habitats and has two large, expressive eyes.
Design a Pokemon that can blend into its forest environment with colors like purple and red.
Give me a Pokemon that can flutter around using its tiny wings, showcasing its bug-type elegance.
